snippet: An explosion in a coal mine in northern Russia killed at least 17 miners in a shaft saturated with methane gas, rescue workers said Monday.
abstract: Explosion in coal mine in northern Russia kills at least 17 miners; officials blame buildup of methane gas for explosion.
lead_paragraph: An explosion in a coal mine in northern Russia killed at least 17 miners in a shaft saturated with methane gas, rescue workers said Monday.

headline.seo: Russia: Explosion in Coal Mine Kills at Least 17
headline.main: Russia: Explosion in Coal Mine Kills at Least 17
headline.print_headline: Russia: Explosion in Coal Mine Kills at Least 17
